Description: Limestone shabti of Maya with a striated gala-wig, a carved face, crossed arms holding the two hoes in low relief, the front of the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in nine rows of incised Hieroglyphs, the back of the legs are inscribed with a single column of incised Hieroglyphs, the back is decorated with a low relief representation of a seed-basket.
